column1: #text=Riding a public bus is n't something I look forward to doing .
#text=When I was a teenager some friends convinced me that it would be fun to jump on a bus and ride around .
#text=Having done so , I disagree , it is n't fun .
#text=However , for some people the bus is the only mode of transportation available .
#text=Riding the bus does require a little research .
#text=You have to know which line you are riding , whether it is an express or whether it will be making many stops .
#text=You must also have the appropriate amount of fare ready to pay .
#text=Once on board the bus , it 's best to find a hopefully clean seat nearby a normal looking person .
#text=Since bus fare is quite cheap and anyone can use it , they do tend to attract undesirable types , so it 's best to be aware of that fact and watch yourself and your belongings closely .
#text=Listen and watch to make sure you do n't miss your stop , since busses do get crowded and you do n't want to miss it .
